funFacts.title: Minionese's Tasty Twist
funFacts.description: Did you know that about 25% of Minionese words are inspired by food names? Words like 'banana' and 'papple' are not just cute but also deliciously fun! I think it adds a quirky charm to this playful language.

funFacts.title: The Multilingual Maestro
funFacts.description: Pierre Coffin, the voice behind Minions, speaks five languages! He improvises most lines, blending French, Spanish, and more. I find it fascinating how this multilingual talent creates such memorable, silly dialogues in Minionese.
